price: 64. Taigi jie atsisuko ir tarė: „Iš tiesų, esi tu Zalimūn (daugiadievis ir bloga darantis).“
arabic: فَرَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ أَنتُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: farajaʿū ilā anfusihim faqālū innakum antumu al-ẓālimūna
